idea title: Google Summer of Code (GSoC) 2024 ideas page
idea description: This page contains ideas for Google Summer of Code 2024. New projects are being added as mentors are confirmed.
skills: Rust, C, Flutter, Docker, GitHub actions

idea description: Develop a Virtual Desktop tool for VR headsets that connects computers to headsets and creates virtual desktops.
Create the Ultimate Alarm Clock II with unique features using Flutter.
Develop a URL shortener with unique features and a TaskServer platform for syncing tasks.

idea title: New things we're currently interested in
idea description: Projects include Mouseless for Linux v2, Desktop Actions in Ilia, and more.
Information about the organization, mentors, communication channels, and expectations from students.
Details about perks for accepted students, including programming books, access to online courses, and resources.
Overview of the tools and technologies used by the organization, including C, Rust, Flutter, Python, and more.

idea description: Information about sample media, shared development server, and resources provided to students.
